attributes.action: Intervene and remove all funding given to research and treatment of the lightning process to anyone under 18 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, The undersigned would like the Prime Minister to remove all funding to the Royal National hospital for Rheuatic Diseases NHS Foundation Trust that has been granted by any trust, organisation, or private bodies,or any other donations of any type, for the purpose of exploring L.P. on anyone under the age of 18

Monies have been provided to explore the Lightning Process amongst children who maybe considered to have M.E. not only will this have the potential to have severe ramifications for the subjects used, it is also likely that the subjects used will NOT be diagnosed by the strict Canadian Criteria thus making it easy to collect and assemble any data they like, to create any prognosis they are wanting to achieve. 

We the below signed see this as an attempt to avert media attention away from the recent developments into the XMRV Virus as a possible cause to M.E. and as a result wish the prime minister to intervene.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
